engrossed-amendment-form.current-chamber: In the Senate of the United States,

section.text: That the bill from the House of Representatives (H.R. 1020) entitled An Act to define STEM education to include computer science, and to support existing STEM education programs at the National Science Foundation., do pass with the following

amendment-instruction.text: On page 5, strike lines 3 through 4 and insert the following:

paragraph.text: in subsections (e) and (f), by striking subsection (g) each place it appears, and inserting subsection (h);
